title: [Feat]: Remove teams-v1 support (EOL)
body:
### Describe the feature

Remove teams-v1 support as it reaches end of life

### Motivation

Currently, we default to teams-v1 allowing users to enable teams-v2.

This is a soft configuration that gracefully handles when people has already moved to teams-v2, but implies a lot of extra code that is now dead for teams-v1

As https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoftteams/teams-classic-client-end-of-availability is reaching EOL in the 1st of july, it will be great to have a release ready before that. 

That will remove a lot of code that is only teams-v1 specific.

### Alternatives

Leave the dead code in there and default to teams-v2, or pretend this didn't happen

### Additional context

_No response_
